application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Erection of a two-storey rear extension above the existing single-storey rear addition to create two new self-contained flats, the creation of three further self-contained flats through the addition of a fourth storey to the roof of the main building and a mansard fourth storey to the roof of the three-storey side extension, and general alterations to the upper floors of the existing building including new or redesigned windows in the rear and side elevations
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (P07(Rev.A), P08(Rev.A), P09(Rev.A), P10(Rev.A) and S01 [received 28/05/2020], P06(Rev.C), Energy Statement and Solar Panel Specifications [received 18/05/2020], P05(Rev.B) [received 17/04/2020], and L01, EX01, EX02, EX03, EX04, EX05, EX06, EX07, EX08, EX09, P01, P02, P03(Rev.A), P04(Rev.A) and Design and Access Statement [received 23/03/2020]) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building (matching brickwork with sliding sash timber windows), unless otherwise indicated on the approved drawings.

Condition : 5 - Prior to commencement of development the applicant shall have entered into a binding arrangement with the Council that will secure Carbon Offset Fund, at the applicant's expense as outlined in the hereby approved Energy Statement.

Condition : 7 - The development hereby permitted shall not be begun until details of the arrangements for storing of waste and recycled materials have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. The arrangements for storing waste and recycled materials shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given and shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied and thereafter retained as such. Further guidance on appropriate capacity and other details is available in the Council's Refuse and Recycling Guidelines (request from Officer).

Condition : 8 - The development hereby permitted shall not be begun until details of the arrangements for cycle storage facilities have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority to accord with London Plan standards. The spaces must be secure, sheltered, easily accessible, and conveniently located. The arrangements shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given and shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied and thereafter retained as such. Further guidance on appropriate dimensions, layouts, and stands is available in the West London Cycle Parking Guidance.

Condition : 9 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the units hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 10 - The development shall not be occupied until arrangements have been agreed in writing with the local planning authority and put in place to ensure that, with the exception of disabled persons, no resident of the development shall obtain a resident's parking permit within any controlled parking zone which may be in force in the area at any time.
